posts.post_content:
Abstein and Sweeney are both sold.  Brashear still available at $20.

Sweeney has a vertical crease running down the middle, very hard to see on the front.  Abstein has a light crease in upper right corner.  Otherwise, all flaws visible in the scan.

Lot does not include the E90-1 Joe Tinker card.

Mark
[url]drumback2@cox.net[/url]
